creator: Prayosha Food Services Pvt. Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
Petpooja Merchant App facilitates Petpooja enabled Merchant to check their outlet statistics, sales, revenue etc happening on a real time basis. This would be one of the extension of the Petpooja Platform.

Application will notify critical events happening related to the restaurants and new features introducing in the Petpooja PoS and other services.
descriptionShort: It's an app for the Petpooja enabled merchants to check out store's business.
title: Petpooja - Merchant App

creator: Prayosha Food Services Pvt. Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
Petpooja is India’s leading restaurant management platform. Powering over 55,000+ restaurants across India, Middle East, Canada, and South Africa.

We offer a holistic cloud-based restaurant POS that includes multiple functionalities like:

1. Billing
2. Inventory
3. Reporting
4. Online Order management
5. Menu management
6. CRM
and much more.

Petpooja has integrated 200+ third-party integrations like Zomato, Paytm, Tally, Swiggy, and much more so that you can manage multiple things on a single dashboard.

We cater to various restaurant brands, from independent to multi-chain outlets like La Pino’z, Hocco Eatery, Jumbo King, Apsara Ice cream, Giani’s, Kailash Parbat, TGIF, The Beer Cafe, Honest, Yum Yum Cha, Anjappar & more. Whether you are a cloud kitchen or a large chain restaurant, Cafe, or QSR, Petpooja has got you covered. We have a ground presence in more than 200+ cities across India and provide 24x7 customer support.


We have recently collaborated with Paytm to launch our two new products:

1. Petpooja GO: The power of Petpooja Pos working in Paytm Device plus Payment Integration is Petpooja Go. Highly recommended for outlets with small space and no hardware.


2. Petpooja PAY: Collect payments super fast and secure your restaurant transactions while avoiding Cash leakages and Payment fraud with a handy Paytm device. Recommended for outlets with high payment pilferage


We're on a mission to build a robust & reliable ecosystem for restaurants in India and solve restaurant management worries for all our restaurant partners and enabling them to grow their businesses sustainably. If you wish to get in touch, call us at: 7046223344 or inquiry@petpooja.com
descriptionShort: It's an app for the Petpooja enabled merchants to check store's business.
title: Petpooja - Merchant App
